tool_description: A YouTube video download API which gives you the download links  of video in all possible formats even the HD ones
name: YTGrabber
title: YTGrabber

api_list.name: /app/get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ytgrabber.p.rapidapi.com/app/get/YfcYPyxXVCo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ytgrabber.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ytgrabber.p.rapidapi.com/app/get/{vid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ytgrabber.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
